title: Mind Your Own Affairs (4U312)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Spot Frodo and add a burden to wound a minion skirmishing a companion who has the Frodo signet.
Lore:	”'Yet those who claim to oppose the Enemy would do well not to hinder it.'”
Rarity:	U
